text: On the "bright side" the OP mentioned, this isn't true. Events that normally get funded aren't getting jack shit since we only get covered for "costs" and not for "donations". So basically any money we would've gotten we won't (my club normally gets nearly 100k that is now going to nowhere just for context). What USAC is doing with this I have no fucking clue.

Not true! There is no research to support this, and quite the opposite some research has supported they enhance each other. Here's a PC article that discusses retinols with vitC or BHA
